text.jpText:
ナリタブライアン、ダービーを制し二冠達成。
世間が興奮に沸く中、ビワハヤヒデの
『宝塚記念』出走会見が開かれた。
text.enText:
Naritabryan wins the Derby and completes the 
Double Crown. While the world was abuzz with 
excitement, a press conference was held for 
Biwa Hayahide's Takarazuka Kinen" press 
conference was held.

text.jpText:
会見でビワハヤヒデは、『宝塚記念』での
勝利。そして、いずれナリタブライアンと
姉妹対決することを宣言する。
text.enText:
At the press conference, Biwa Hayahide said 
that she is looking forward to winning the 
Takarazuka Kinen, and that she will 
eventually be able to compete with Narita And 
she declared that she and Naritabu and 
Nalitabu Ryan.

text.jpText:
これまで以上に注目されるビワハヤヒデ。
トレーナーは彼女を支えるべく、
対戦するウマ娘たちの分析に勤しむ。
text.enText:
Biwa Hayahide is attracting more attention 
than ever. To support her, her trainer her 
trainer is working hard to analyze the Uma 
Musume who will be competing against her.

text.jpText:
そして、目に留まったダービーの映像。
そこには“怪物”ナリタブライアンが、
異常な速度で成長している姿が映っていた。
text.enText:
Then, a video of the Derby caught my eye. 
There, we saw the "monster" Naritabu Ryan 
growing at an extraordinary rate. the 
"monster" NARITABURAIRIAN, was growing at an 
extraordinary rate.
